channel.title: Teleblock when attacking an npc?
channel.description:
Alright so I'm almost done making my rare area. Now i want to make it that so when the player attacks said rare dropping npc that they are teleblocked until they kill the creature or they die.
I've tried fooling around with it, but I'm not exactly sure what i should do Could someone give me a helpful nudge?
